structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.catch_line: Liability for aiding escape of prisoner.
law.text: Any person who aids a prisoner to escape, or knowingly conceals him after he escapes, or in any way hinders or prevents his capture shall be liable to the party aggrieved for any damages sustained.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1605.
